thread.title: Delta Air Lines Earnings: What To Watch

author: Doug Cameron
title: Delta Air Lines Earnings: What To Watch
text:
Delta Air Lines Inc. opens the U.S. airline reporting season this week with investors still fixated by concerns that capacity growth and cost creep will fritter away newfound profits as carriers fall back into old -- and bad -- habits. Delta and others insist they’ll stick to long-term profitability goals. The largest U.S. carrier by market value and the No. 2 by traffic reports first quarter results and will update guidance before the market opens on April 12.
Here’s what you need to know.
...
